lineColor.title: Line color
lineColor.description: The outline color of the features, specified as a CSS color string.

fillColor.title: Fill color
fillColor.description: The fill color of the features, specified as a CSS color string.

layer.title: Layer
layer.description: The name of the layer to use the Mapbox vector tiles.

idProperty.title: ID property
idProperty.description: The name of the property that is a unique ID for features.

nameProperty.title: Name property
nameProperty.description: The name of the property from which to obtain the name of features.

maximumNativeZoom.title: Maximum native zoom
maximumNativeZoom.description: The maximum zoom level for which tile files exist.

maximumZoom.title: Maximum zoom
maximumZoom.description:
The maximum zoom level that can be displayed by using the data in the
MapboxVectorTileCatalogItem's maximumNativeZoom tiles.

minimumZoom.title: Minimum zoom
minimumZoom.description: The minimum zoom level for which tile files exist.
